title: Molding Calculator - Estimate Trim, Baseboard & Crown

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: Total\ Panel\ Trim = Number\ of\ Panels \times [2 \times (Panel\ Width + Panel\ Height)]
formulas.raw: Total\ Panel\ Trim = Number\ of\ Panels \times [2 \times (Panel\ Width + Panel\ Height)]

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: Total\ Linear\ Feet\ Needed = Base\ Measurement + Waste\ Amount
formulas.raw: Total\ Linear\ Feet\ Needed = Base\ Measurement + Waste\ Amount

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: Total\ Pieces = \lceil \frac{Total\ Linear\ Feet\ Needed}{Length\ per\ Piece} \rceil
formulas.raw: Total\ Pieces = \lceil \frac{Total\ Linear\ Feet\ Needed}{Length\ per\ Piece} \rceil
